name: Idle Fort
description:
The most popular high-quality idle-merge game on the TikTok!
Let's Go -- Get the highest level of Fort!
Join your friends on the magical journey of “Brick-Breaker” and lead your Fort group into the traditional and classic game; against the bricks that come in the step by step!


Warning: I am not a tower-defence game! Not even a brick-breaker!

Features:

1. No Need to Rush
Set up your fort group, and your forts will be shooting for you automatically!
Simply waiting and more power and a supreme fort!
Even if you are offline, you will get a generous reward!


2. Infinite Strategic
More than 50 different levels of the fort are waiting for you to merge!
Different attack effects, different shooting strategies, let you experience different bricks-breaker!
Exploring the rare currency in the secret world and greatly enhancing your combat effectiveness!
Enjoy the fun of the game with ease control!


3. Rich Game Content
Idle placement, automatic shooting, manual aiming, secret exploration, collection, merge!
Daily challenges, Ranking ups!
Endless exciting game content waiting for you to experience!


5. To be a Challenger
Join the fight of the ranks, and keep challenging your limits!
Win the strongest badge that belongs to you!
